algorithm.name: KEYWORDTAGGING
algorithm.description: Performs keyword tagging on text and transcripts.

properties.name: FULL_REGEX_SEARCH
properties.description: Toggles REGEX search to include all matching trigger words associated with the regex patterns for each tag. When disabled, only the first instance of the first matching trigger word for each tag category is included.

properties.name: TAGGING_FILE
properties.description: Name of a JSON file that describes a tag hierarchy to be used for keyword tagging. Will default to the plugin's config folder unless an alternate path to tagging file is specified (i.e. `$MPF_HOME/.../text-tags.json`).

properties.name: FEED_FORWARD_PROPS_TO_PROCESS
properties.description: Comma-separated list of property names indicating which properties in the feed-forward track or detection to perform keyword tagging on. If the first property listed is present, then keyword tagging is performed on that property. If it's not then the next property in the list is considered. At most, keyword tagging is only performed on one property.

actions.name: KEYWORD TAGGING TEXT FILE ACTION
actions.description: Performs keyword tagging on a plain text file.

actions.name: KEYWORD TAGGING (WITH FF REGION) ACTION
actions.description: Performs keyword tagging on detections with TEXT and TRANSCRIPT properties.

tasks.name: KEYWORD TAGGING TEXT FILE TASK
tasks.description: Performs keyword tagging on a plain text file.

tasks.name: KEYWORD TAGGING (WITH FF REGION) TASK
tasks.description: Performs keyword tagging on detections with TEXT and TRANSCRIPT properties.

pipelines.name: KEYWORD TAGGING TEXT FILE PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs keyword tagging on a plain text file.
